# Battle of Møn (1657)

| combatant2        =
| commander1        =  Klas Bjelkenstierna
| commander2        =  Henrik Bjelke   Niels Juel
| strength1         = 25 ships of the line8 armed merchant ships2 fireships4 smaller ships1,231 cannons6,000 men

| campaignbox       =
| image             =
}}
The indecisive naval battle of Møn was a battle during the Dano-Swedish War (1657–1658). A large number of ships was involved, but the fight was not very intense.
